questions.question: What is the correct form of 'ser' for 'yo'?
questions.explanation: 'Ser' is irregular: yo soy, tú eres, él/ella es.

questions.question: What is the correct form of 'tener' for 'él'?
questions.explanation: 'Tener' is irregular: yo tengo, tú tienes, él tiene.

questions.question: What is the correct form of 'ir' for 'nosotros'?
questions.explanation: 'Ir' is very irregular: yo voy, tú vas, él va, nosotros vamos.

questions.question: What is the correct form of 'hacer' for 'tú'?
questions.explanation: 'Hacer' is irregular: yo hago, tú haces, él hace.

questions.question: What is the correct form of 'venir' for 'yo'?
questions.explanation: 'Venir' is irregular: yo vengo, tú vienes, él viene.

questions.question: What is the correct form of 'decir' for 'ellos'?
questions.explanation: 'Decir' is irregular: yo digo, tú dices, él dice, ellos dicen.

questions.question: What is the correct form of 'saber' for 'yo'?
questions.explanation: 'Saber' is irregular: yo sé, tú sabes, él sabe.

questions.question: What is the correct form of 'dar' for 'ustedes'?
questions.explanation: 'Dar' is irregular: yo doy, tú das, él da, ustedes dan.

questions.question: What is the correct form of 'ver' for 'nosotros'?
questions.explanation: 'Ver' is irregular: yo veo, tú ves, él ve, nosotros vemos.

questions.question: What is the correct form of 'oír' for 'yo'?
questions.explanation: 'Oír' is very irregular: yo oigo, tú oyes, él oye.

questions.question: Complete: Yo _____ estudiante. (ser)
questions.explanation: 'Ser' conjugated for 'yo' is 'soy'.

questions.question: Complete: Ella _____ veinte años. (tener)
questions.explanation: 'Tener' conjugated for 'ella' is 'tiene'.

questions.question: Complete: Nosotros _____ al cine. (ir)
questions.explanation: 'Ir' conjugated for 'nosotros' is 'vamos'.

questions.question: Complete: ¿Qué _____ tú? (hacer)
questions.explanation: 'Hacer' conjugated for 'tú' is 'haces'.

questions.question: Complete: Yo _____ de España. (venir)
questions.explanation: 'Venir' conjugated for 'yo' is 'vengo'.

questions.question: What is the correct form of 'hablar' for 'yo'?
questions.explanation: AR verbs: yo -o, tú -as, él -a, nosotros -amos.

questions.question: What is the correct form of 'comer' for 'tú'?
questions.explanation: ER verbs: yo -o, tú -es, él -e, nosotros -emos.

questions.question: What is the correct form of 'vivir' for 'ella'?
questions.explanation: IR verbs: yo -o, tú -es, él -e, nosotros -imos.

questions.question: What is the correct form of 'estudiar' for 'nosotros'?
questions.explanation: AR verbs add -amos for nosotros: estudiamos.

questions.question: What is the correct form of 'beber' for 'ellos'?
questions.explanation: ER verbs add -en for ellos/ellas: beben.

questions.question: What is the correct form of 'escribir' for 'ustedes'?
questions.explanation: IR verbs add -en for ustedes: escriben.

questions.question: What is the correct form of 'trabajar' for 'usted'?
questions.explanation: Usted uses the same form as él/ella: trabaja.

questions.question: What is the correct form of 'aprender' for 'yo'?
questions.explanation: ER verbs: yo form ends in -o: aprendo.

questions.question: What is the correct form of 'abrir' for 'tú'?
questions.explanation: IR verbs: tú form ends in -es: abres.

questions.question: What is the correct form of 'caminar' for 'ellas'?
questions.explanation: AR verbs: ellas form ends in -an: caminan.

questions.question: Complete: Yo _____ español. (hablar)
questions.explanation: AR verb 'hablar' for 'yo' is 'hablo'.

questions.question: Complete: Tú _____ pizza. (comer)
questions.explanation: ER verb 'comer' for 'tú' is 'comes'.

questions.question: Complete: Ella _____ en Madrid. (vivir)
questions.explanation: IR verb 'vivir' for 'ella' is 'vive'.

questions.question: Complete: Nosotros _____ mucho. (estudiar)
questions.explanation: AR verb 'estudiar' for 'nosotros' is 'estudiamos'.

questions.question: Complete: Ellos _____ agua. (beber)
questions.explanation: ER verb 'beber' for 'ellos' is 'beben'.
